description:
"What was your nickname when you were a little kid?"
"I'd have to say, 'Little Red'," Shey replied.
"I knew it'd be something with the red hair."
Shey is a true redhead. From the hair on his head, to his eyelashes, to the light fuzz on his arms, to his bright red pubic hair. He is a redhead!
He's also got an incredible, muscular body, a smooth, round butt, and milky white skin.
"You're kind of shy, aren't you?"
"Yeah," he said reluctantly. "I always have been."
He did come out of his shell enough to show off with a soccer ball and to climb right up a big tree.
And once he got naked and hard he wasn't shy at all!
title: Shey
